questions.question: The power of High Court to issue writ covers
Which one of the following subjects comes under the common jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and the High Court?
options: B. Dispute between Centre and State
D. Protection from the Violation of the Constitution

questions.question: A High Court Judge addresses his letter of resignation to
options: B. The Chief Justice of India
C. The Chief Justice of his High Court
D. The Governor of the State
